brand.name: Wallcraft
brand.tagline: AI designed art for your home

hero.title: Your personal art studio
hero.subtitle: Design unique artwork tailored to your room. See it on your wall before you buy.

step1.title: Upload your room
step1.description: Take a photo of your wall and upload it. Mark the area where you want your artwork.

step2.title: Choose your style
step2.description: Pick from curated styles — minimal, Scandinavian, abstract, modern, photography and more.

step3.title: See it on your wall
step3.description: Get 4 unique concepts placed directly on your wall. Adjust size, frame and position.

upload.title: Upload your room
upload.description: Take a photo of your room or use our demo room to get started.
upload.dropzone: Drop your photo here or click to browse
upload.formats: JPG, PNG or HEIC — max 10 MB

wallMarker.title: Mark the wall
wallMarker.description: Click on the image to mark the 4 corners of the wall area

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Get inspired by designs from our community

boris.subtitle: Art & interior expert
boris.errorResponse: Sorry, I couldn't respond right now. Try again.
boris.networkError: Network error — couldn't reach Boris. Try again.
boris.actionStyle: Ask me which art style suits your room.
boris.actionEditor: Ask me about size, frame and placement.
boris.actionPrint: Ask me about prints, quality and framing.
boris.actionVariant: Ask me which variant fits best.
boris.actionChat: Ask me about art, interiors and design.

artChat.title: BorisArt AI
artChat.subtitle: Your art expert
artChat.greeting: Hi! I'm BorisArt AI, your personal art expert. I can help you analyze artworks, tell stories, discuss trends and give investment advice. I can also see which works you've scanned and saved in your portfolio. What would you like to explore today?
artChat.errorResponse: Sorry, I couldn't process your request right now. Try again later.
artChat.selectArtworkFirst: Please select an artwork first so I can tell its story.
artChat.needArtworks: You need some artworks in your portfolio or from scanning for me to analyze. Try scanning some artworks first!

market.uploadRoomDesc: Upload a photo of your room
market.takePhotoDesc: Take a photo of the wall where you want to hang
market.networkError: Network error. Check your connection and try again.
market.markWallDesc: Click to mark the 4 corners of the wall

artist.loginDesc: Log in to manage your artworks
artist.uploadFirstArtwork: Upload your first artwork to start selling!
artist.title: Title

posterLab.title: Poster Lab
posterLab.chooseFavoriteDesc: Choose the variant you like best, or refine with the controls

home.badge: Now in beta — try for free

hero.title: Art that fits
hero.subtitle: Create AI-generated art, discover local artists or upload your own photo. See how it looks on your wall — before you order.

steps.title: How it works
steps.subtitle: From idea to art on the wall — in just a few minutes.

s1.title: Create an account
s1.desc: Sign up for free and get access to all tools.

s2.title: Explore & create
s2.desc: Generate AI art, browse the gallery or upload your own.

s3.title: Try on your wall
s3.desc: Upload a photo of your room and see the artwork live on the wall.

s4.title: Order & enjoy
s4.desc: Choose frame and size. We print and deliver to your door.

features.title: Everything you need for wall art
features.subtitle: Five powerful tools — from AI generation to gallery.

wallcraftStudio.title: Wallcraft Studio
wallcraftStudio.desc: Create AI-generated wall art. Upload your room, choose a style and see the artwork on your wall in real time.

artMarket.title: Art Market
artMarket.desc: Discover unique art from local artists and photographers. Try the artwork on your wall before you buy.

creativeTools.title: Creative Tools
creativeTools.desc: Mandala Maker, Pattern Studio, Abstract Painter and Color Field Studio — create your own art.

printYourOwn.title: Print Your Own
printYourOwn.desc: Upload your own photo and see how it looks on your wall. Order as a poster with frame.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.desc: Explore AI-generated art and unique works from artists. Find inspiration and save your favorites.

boris.desc: Boris analyzes artworks, comments on how a painting fits on your wall, gives investment advice and helps you find the right style. All powered by AI.
boris.artAnalysisDesc: Analyzes style, technique, market value and potential.
boris.wallCommentsDesc: Comments on how the artwork fits in your room — colors, proportions, style.
boris.investmentAdviceDesc: Helps you find undervalued works with profit potential.
boris.chatMockup1: This work has a strong composition with deep blue tones that would fit perfectly against your light wall. I recommend size 50×70 cm with a white frame for the best effect.
boris.chatMockup2: What do you think about it as an investment?
boris.chatMockup3: The artist has a rising trend. Similar works sold for 40% more last year. I assess the risk as low with good potential.

wallPreview.title: See the artwork on your wall
wallPreview.desc: Upload a photo of your room, mark the wall and see instantly how the artwork looks. Drag, zoom and change frame in real time. Boris also gives you his expert comment on how the artwork fits in the room.

artistCta.title: Are you an artist or photographer?
artistCta.desc: Upload your works to Art Market and reach new buyers. We handle printing, framing and delivery. You set the price — we split the profit 50/50.

signup.title: Ready to start?
signup.desc: Create a free account and get access to all tools. No commitment, no card.
signup.terms: By signing up you agree to our

footer.tagline: Your creative platform for wall art. Create, discover and order.

marketPage.subtitle: Discover unique art from local artists and photographers. Try the artwork on your own wall before you buy.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Handpicked prints — AI art, photography and classic works. Museum-quality printing, delivered to your door.
homepage.wallcraftDesc: Upload a photo of your room. Choose artwork, frame and size — and see exactly how it will look before you order.
homepage.artistTitle: Show your art to all of Scandinavia
homepage.artistDesc: We handle printing, shipping and payment. You upload — we do the rest. No startup fee, no commitment.
homepage.borisQuote: Every work in the gallery is handpicked and quality-checked.
homepage.footerTagline: Handpicked prints for modern homes. Art, photography and AI-generated works.

legal.studioNotice: AI-generated designs are created within the ArtBoris studio and are sold as physical prints for personal use. ArtBoris may display these designs in its gallery.
legal.studioConsent: By generating a design you agree to our terms.
legal.galleryNotice: AI-generated works created in the studio may be displayed in the ArtBoris Gallery.
legal.checkoutNotice: AI-generated designs are sold as physical prints for personal use according to our terms.
legal.termsCheckbox: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
